name: credchain-zk
description: Zero-knowledge circuits for Credchain cross-credential verification

scripts.setup: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 pot12_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name='contribution' -v
scripts.compile: snarkjs groth16 setup main.r1cs pot12_0001.ptau main_00.zkey && snarkjs zkey verify main.r1cs pot12_0001.ptau main_00.zkey
